mapper.select: select t1.*,t2.lastname,v1.welfare_amount_salaries,v1.welfare_amount_bonus,v1.welfare_amount_weal from personnel_salary t1 left join hrmresource t2 on t1.workcode =t2.workcode left join (select workcode,welfare_date,sum(welfare_amount_salaries) welfare_amount_salaries,sum(welfare_amount_bonus) welfare_amount_bonus,sum(welfare_amount_weal) welfare_amount_weal from personnel_welfare group by workcode,welfare_date) v1 on t1.salary_date = v1.welfare_date and t1.workcode = v1.workcode ${ew.customSqlSegment}
select sum(NET_SALARY) NET_SALARY,SALARY_DATE from personnel_salary where SALARY_DATE = #{month} group by SALARY_DATE
select count(*) IMPORT_NUMBER,SALARY_DATE from personnel_salary where SALARY_DATE = #{month} group by SALARY_DATE

select u1.totalnumber,u2.departmentname from ( select sum(t1.NET_SALARY) totalnumber,t2.DEPARTMENTID from PERSONNEL_SALARY t1 left join HRMRESOURCE t2 on t1.WORKCODE = t2.WORKCODE group by t2.DEPARTMENTID ORDER BY totalnumber desc) u1 left join HrmDepartment u2 on u1.departmentid = u2.id where u2.id is not null and rownum <9
